attributes.action: dissolve parliament and force all existing MPs to undergo reselection by the registered voters in their constituencies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MPs expenses fiasco has caused the British people to lose confidence in their elected representatives. After the details of MPs expenses are published, the government must dissolve parliament and give the British people the right to reselect their MP or an alternative person to represent them as their elected servant.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
